title: NEW HIGH IN BORDER ARRESTS
body:
A record 1,265,054 illegal aliens, more than 95 percent of them Mexicans, were apprehended at United States 
borders in the fiscal year that ended Sept. 30, the Immigration and Naturalization Service says. But despite the 
figures showing overall apprehensions increased by 11 percent, Commissioner Alan C. Nelson said this week that 
''the problem won't go away'' and urged quick approval of legislation to stem the tide.
